text: Arizona State University is a public university in Tempe, Arizona. The university has about 70,440 students. It was founded in 1885. The current president of the university is Michael M. Crow. ==Sports== The sports teams of the university are called the Sun Devils. ASU has 20 varsity teams, almost all of which compete in the Big 12 Conference. ==Other websites== * Arizona State University's Official website * Arizona State Sun Devils' Official athletics website Category:Big 12 Conference Category:Arizona State University Category:Tempe, Arizona Category:1885 establishments in the United States
title: Arizona State University
